name: Yang Zou (邹扬)
description:
**Biography:** I'm a Ph.D. student at [Tsinghua University](http://www.tsinghua.edu.cn/), advised by [Yuan He](http://tns.thss.tsinghua.edu.cn/sun/members/YuanHe/). And now I am a member of [The System and Ubiquitous Networking Group (SUN)](http://tns.thss.tsinghua.edu.cn/sun/). I received my B.S. degree in College of Electronic & Information Engineering from Beijing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics (Beihang University) in 2023.
**Research Interests:** Wireless Networking, Low power IoT and RF Computing.
**Contact Me:** zouy23@mails.tsinghua.edu.cn; zouyang.yh@gmail.com
